job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Our client, leading automotive supplier, is looking for machine learning engineer, to join their team in Berlin area. Responsibilities Design, code, experiment and implement models and algorithms Work closely with researchers to take research developed ML models to production Build and improve existing data pipelines Implement a cloud-enabled architecture Contribute to and influence technology and product strategy and roadmaps Qualifications Degree in computer science or electrical engineering 3-5 years of experience in software development, applications and services Good knowledge of Python and DevOps Fluent German and English
